entries.title: What we learned driving VW’s new electric ID Buzz

entries.title: Mini-review: Dell’s XPS 15 9520 is a low-key improvement to an established design
entries.description: If previous XPS 15 models have turned you off, this one won't change your mind.

entries.title: Leaked “shopping list” reveals Russia’s most “desperately” needed war tech
entries.description: Ukraine says Russia's military arsenal has dwindled by nearly half.

entries.title: FCC has obtained detailed broadband maps from ISPs for the first time ever
entries.description: FCC aims to release the most accurate US-wide broadband map to date in November.

entries.title: Chrome patches high-severity 0-day, its 6th this year
entries.description: Security hole exists in a browser component known as Mojo.

entries.title: Brazil halts sales of charger-less iPhones, fines Apple $2.3 million
entries.description: Selling iPhones without chargers only passes burden on to the consumer, feds say.

entries.title: We peek inside Porsche’s private Le Mans race car test
entries.description: Ars attended a test for the new hybrid endurance prototype car, the 963.

entries.title: Samsung starts shipping Android 12L after a six-month wait
entries.description: Google's tablet-focused release is finally coming to large-screen Samsung devices.

entries.title: Archaeologists unearth remains of 17th century female “vampire” in Poland
entries.description: Female skeleton was buried with sickle placed across her neck and a padlock on big toe.

entries.title: Hyper’s 140 W charger is a smaller brick for the biggest MacBooks
entries.description: Gallium nitride allows for more ports, smaller size than Apple's charger.

entries.title: With Stable Diffusion, you may never believe what you see online again

entries.title: Astounding new Webb image reveals tens of thousands of young stars
entries.description: This stellar nursery is located in the Large Magellanic Cloud.

entries.title: Best of 2000 AD proves why the comics are classic
entries.description: New anthology of British series actually manages to collect the work that makes it great.

entries.description: Valve hardware provides a simple, authentic emulated experience.

entries.title: Ireland fines Instagram 405M euro for failing to protect children’s data

entries.description: "We cannot work with a partner who is completely trampling on those values."
